description: Variation of condition 1 (Plan Numbers), condition 4 (Pre-completion Sound Insulation Test Certificates) 8 (Glazing details) 9 (Cycle parking/storage) 10 (Refuse and Recycling Collection Strategy) pursuant to planning permission 15/02650/FUL dated 08/07/2015 for ` Conversion of single dwelling into four flats with 2 storey rear extension. Three storey rear extension (including basement level), new light well to front garden. Single storey front porch extension and changes to windows and doors. Extension to roof including hip to gable end, rear dormer window and 2no. roof lights to front elevation. Provision of amenity and refuse facilities.` Amendments include refuse stores to be implemented in accordance with details shown on plan Nos: 1058-A020A1, 1058-A010A1, & 1058-A030A3,  glazing details to be implemented in accordance with plan Nos: 1058-A030A3, cycle parking to be implemented in accordance with 1058-A030A3, 1058-A020A1 & 1058-A010A1 and sound insulation to be implemented in accordance with the Sound Insulation Certificates Doc Ref: 11331S
